effect.sword-shield: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind.
